snippet: The trial of a former treasurer, Timothy P. Cahill, ended in a mistrial on Wednesday, after the jury announced a deadlock.
abstract: Corruption trial of former Massachusetts treasurer Timothy P Cahill ends in mistrial after jury announces a deadlock.
lead_paragraph: The trial of a former treasurer, Timothy P. Cahill, ended in a mistrial on Wednesday, after the jury announced a deadlock.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Mistrial in Treasurer’s Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Mistrial In Treasurer’s Corruption Case
